The plan revisions address the cascading dependency issues and allow for a more efficient workflow.

recommendation: Revise the plan by adding the missing step-1 as suggested in the unblock action result. Reorder step-7 (documentation) to the end of the plan, after step-8 (testing). Once the plan is updated, proceed with the development following the revised step order.
